page.title: 02A HILL FARM AT WILLSTONE
page.content: Willstone Farm has been owned by one family for 63 years.It comprises 700 acres which include Caradoc Hill,459m, Little Caradoc,Robin's Tump and the Wilderness.The steep slopes make cultivation difficult even with a 4- wheel drive tractor. In 1984 the Wilderness and Robin's Tump were cultivated for the first time and were transformed from an area of wild bracken,brambles and thorn bushes,into good grazing land. To help us check on the cattle and sheep scattered over the hillside,we have a 3-wheel motorbike,and this has made our lives a little easier. Progress indeed. Winter snow and blizzards are a hazard in such a hilly terrain.
